title: Mountaintop View 12 - 24 - 24 Potato Bowl , classy Skipper , Basketball players of week and other Monday news
body_text:
Mountaintop View 12-24-24 Potato Bowl, classy Skipper, Basketball players of week and other Monday news
Fresno State could not deliver a final win for interim head coach Tim Skipper as they fell in double OT to Northern Illinois in the Famous Idaho Potato Bowl. To add insult to injury, during the game star RB Malik Sherrod announced via social media that he was transferring to Boise State via the transfer portal.
Classy parting words from a classy man
Ram head coach Jay Norvell has gotten Tyson Summers to return to Fort Collins and take over the role as Defensive Coordinator that he held as recently as 2015. Additionally, Norvell also named the first General Manager in program history.
New Lobo head football coach Jason Eck announced that he is bringing his two coordinators from University of Idaho along with 4 other assistants as he starts assembling his coaching staff.
Basketball Players of the Week
Men’s
Arguably the best guard in the MWC from New Mexico is joined by a freshman from Air Force as this week’s award winners.
Two repeat winners from Colorado State and San Diego State are named as winners based on their play from last week.
Aztecs move up in both men’s basketball polls
On the horizon:
- Later today: Reacts Survey:
- Later today: The Good, The Bad, The Ugly: 2024 Best and Worst Moments
- Later today: The Hawaii Bowl
- Later today: Hike’s Peak Podcast Episode 82
- Coming Wednesday: Peak Perspective: 2024 Top Plays
